org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.sink.ganglia

Class GangliaMetricVisitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.metrics2.sink.ganglia.GangliaMetricVisitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetricsVisitor

     class GangliaMetricVisitor
extends Object
implements MetricsVisitor
    Since implementations of Metric are not public, hence use a visitor to figure out the type and slope of the metric. Counters have "positive" slope.

      • getSlope

        AbstractGangliaSink.GangliaSlope getSlope()
        Returns:
        the slope of a visited metric. Slope is positive for counters and null for others
